events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the mistake as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery reported by the customer.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request and communicate next steps with the customer.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to verify the issue?
My order number is 4583297, and I have attached a photo showing the item I actually received, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately. You should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the prompt response and assistance. I appreciate the quick action and look forward to receiving the refund.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please check your payment account in a few days. Let us know if you need any further help.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is now satisfactory regarding your order.
Since the refund has been completed and the customer is satisfied, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
